snippet: Arsenal and Manchester City continued their winning ways Saturday in England’s Premier League.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Arsenal and Manchester City continue their winning ways in England’s Premier League by grabbing home wins to stay 1-2 in the standings; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Arsenal and Manchester City continued their winning ways Saturday in England’s Premier League.

headline.main: Arsenal and Manchester City Don’t Miss a Beat
headline.print_headline: Arsenal and Manchester City Don’t Miss a Beat
